snippet.title: Official Princess Pajama Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Princess PAJAMA by BLUESIDE Inc.

Escape from your daily routine with Princess PAJAMA!

Once upon a time, Princess PAJAMA, who was likable but too naive sometimes, got kidnapped by the world's most bored king, King Mon.

Your job is to rescue the princess and escape from the monster's den while protecting her!

Only the true hero knows the true meaning of multi-tasking.

[Features]

-Perfect combination of non-stop action and strategic defense.

-Destroy monsters' dens one by one while protecting the princess.

-Learn new skills and combos as you level up.

-Five general units, and four special summonable units that are all unique.

-Use a potion or throw a bomb to get out of danger.

-Equip items wisely to power-up your stats.

-Lose yourself in a fantasy world full of lovable characters.

Facebook:

http://www.facebook.com/PrincessPAJAMA

iTunes Store Page:

http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/princess-pajama/id495886183

Homepage:

http://www.princesspajama.co.kr/
